name: master-ball
effect: Used in battle : Catches a wild Pokémon without fail. If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Catches a wild Pokémon every time.

flavor_text.black_white: The best Ball with the ultimate level of performance. It will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The best Ball with the ultimate level of performance. It will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.
